channel.title: Zombie scape source?
channel.description: well im using it but i cant wield any other weapons than the guns, is it suppose to be like this? and if not how do i make it so i can wield the items

item.title: Zombie scape source?
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

JvSwift:

zombie-scape cache was messed p, you have to manually code in the items to wield. Go into Client8.java in the client and add the item you wish to equip. if it doesnt go into the right equip spot go into the item.java in the source and put the item id into the correct section.

Read full topic
